BBFN1.M.DE.N.1.L.R12.S1P.F0.S.B000.Z01.B: Short-term liabilities of enterprises vis-à-vis foreign banks arising from financial operations / Total / Offshore banking centres

General: From January 2003, including Guernsey, Jersey and the Isle of Man. Up to December 2010 including Niederl. Antillen; from January 2011 including Bonaire,St.Eustatius, Saba; Curacao; St.Martin (Dutch part)
